alert.note: Alert for Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hidalgo and western Willacy Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edcouch-Elsa High School, or over Edcouch, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elsa, Edcouch, La Villa, Hargill, San Manuel, Linn, Faysville, Red Gate, Jose Borrego Middle School and Eisenhower Elementary School. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
